name: Phrog Phobia
description:
The phrogs are invading! You have Ranidaphobia (the fear of frogs), a your only method of survival is to fight back! Squish the phrogs before you die of fright in this pixel art game!

Note: Make sure to turn up your sound before playing!

Additional details:

This game was made for the Mini Jam 79, a 72 hour game jam. The game was made by Jayden and Evan within time restrictions. All music and art was made by Evan, and all game development was made by Jayden.

Download Instructions:

1. Download the zip file

2. Extract the zip file

3. Run the .exe file in the build folder.

4. Have fun!
